<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be an <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and your <S%H127>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H2256>line;<s%> and you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in a <S%H2931>polluted<s%> <S%H127>land:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall surely <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> forth of his <S%H127>land.<s%>
